title: 窝巢!飞行靴子MOD确认!!!!!!快去下载
author: dante125
txt_content:
本帖最后由 dante125 于 2010-11-18 22:01 编辑 

海尔靴1.2 -需要303的ModLoader（我用ModLoader 1.21 +303-1.0） 
armor/hermes_1.png -- 3D graphics of the boots (when worn)armor/hermes_1.png - 三维图形的靴子（当穿着） 
gui/hermesboots.png -- 2D graphics of the boots (the item)桂/ hermesboots.png - 二维图形的靴子（项目） 
hc.class -- Meat of the modhc.class - 国防部肉 
hermesarmorrenderer.class -- 3D renderer of the boots (Obsidian Tools compatible)hermesarmorrenderer.class - 三维渲染的靴子（黑曜石工具兼容） 
hermesboots.class -- Defines the boot durability, etchermesboots.class - 定义开机耐久性等 
mod_hermesboots.class -- Adds the boots to the gamemod_hermesboots.class - 增加了靴子的游戏 

Kin_Sokat wrote: ...Kin_Sokat说：... paintlerly Hermes' boots...paintlerly海尔靴子... 

Just re-name it hermes_1, make sure it's .png (it should be already, but just in case), and place it in the armor folder in the hermes boots .zip.只需重新命名为hermes_1，确保它的。巴布亚新几内亚（应该了，但以防万一），并将其放置在在爱马仕靴子盔甲文件夹中。拉链。 
If anyone wants the boots done for any other texture pack, Pm me or post something saying so and i'll do my best.如果有人想对包做任何其他质地的靴子，发布或张贴的东西我这样说，我会尽我所能。 


This mod adds Hermes' Boots to the game.这个mod增加了海尔靴的游戏。 Hermes' Boots will only activate when you've fallen from a dangerous height.海尔靴只会激活当你从高处堕下的危险。 After falling a few blocks in air, the boots kick in and allow you to float safely to the ground.下跌后在空气中的几个街区，靴子踢，让你安全地浮到地面。 The boots have a specific durability and it is variably affected by the height of your falls, so if you fall from a great height, the boots' durability will quickly decrease.新鞋有特定的耐用性，这是由您的可变下降，因此，如果你从高处下跌，靴子耐久性的影响将迅速降低高度。 

NOTE: If you have any compatibility issues, such as another armor renderer besides Obsidian Tools, please let me know and I'll attempt to fix it for you.注意：如果您有任何兼容性问题，如另一除了黑曜石盔甲渲染工具，请让我知道，我会尝试为您解决它。 

 

http://dl.dropbox.com/u/9186024/Minecraft/Hermes%20Boots.ziphttp://dl.dropbox.com/u/9186024/Minecraft/Hermes％20Boots.zip 

History:历史： 
1.2 -- Added No Durability version.1.2 - 增加了不耐久的版本。 
1.1 -- Fixed bug where if you removed boots mid-flight, game crashes.1.1 - 修正错误：如果您删除靴飞行中，游戏崩溃。 
1.0 -- Initial.1.0 - 初始。 



谷歌翻译.但飞行靴子确认!!!
http://www.minecraftforum.net/viewtopic.php?f=25&t=76015

replies.author: 哥。蛋疼
replies.txt_content:
这文章我上次看了~~   

我叫过信游翻译~~记过他说挂了几张图就没翻译了~~

replies.author: dante125
replies.txt_content:
This mod adds Hermes' Boots to the game.

这个mod增加了海尔靴的游戏。 
Hermes' Boots will only activate when you've fallen from a dangerous height.

海尔靴只会激活当你从高处堕下的危险。 
After falling a few blocks in air, the boots kick in and allow you to float safely to the ground.

下跌后在空气中的几个街区，靴子踢，让你安全地浮到地面。 
The boots have a specific durability and it is variably affected by the height of your falls, so if you fall from a great height, the boots' durability will quickly decrease.

新鞋有特定的耐用性，这是由您的可变下降，因此，如果你从高处下跌，靴子耐久性的影响将迅速降低高度。 


NOTE: If you have any compatibility issues, such as another armor renderer besides Obsidian Tools, please let me know and I'll attempt to fix it for you.

注意：如果您有任何兼容性问题，如另一除了黑曜石盔甲渲染工具，请让我知道，我会尝试为您解决它。 




http://dl.dropbox.com/u/9186024/Minecraft/Hermes%20Boots.zip

http://dl.dropbox.com/u/9186024/Minecraft/Hermes％20Boots.zip 


History:

历史： 

1.2 -- Added No Durability version.

1.2 - 增加了不耐久的版本。 

1.1 -- Fixed bug where if you removed boots mid-flight, game crashes.

1.1 - 修正错误：如果您删除靴飞行中，游戏崩溃。 

1.0 -- Initial.

1.0 - 初始。 
看这段不就该懂了么..会长大爱
